title: Data Veracity - Editing an Error Code - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: In the Data Veracity - Error Codes page, under the Actions column, click the ellipsis() button and select Edit . Note! You can only edit the Description field in the Edit Error Code dialog. The Error Code name must be unique and can not be edited. Once you are satisfied with your changes, click Apply to save them. A success message will appear, indicating that the error code has been successfully edited. Changes to the error code will be reflected in the error code table. For the predefined system error codes, AGGR_UNMATCHED_UDR , and DUPLICATE_UDR , you will find an edit button instead of an ellipses button under the Actions column. Click on it to change the description of an error code.
